description: Developed a dynamic stock market app using React Native and Real Time Finance API.
Implemented secure login with email and password using Redux.
Enabled real-time stock search with detailed stock cards (name, ticker, price, image).
Created an interactive UI with a bottom sheet and paginated stock display.
Managed stock orders with add, remove, and swipe to buy functionalities, including success notifications.
Utilized Market Trend API for trending stocks and Search API for stock searches.
